title: "The Book Of" publication: "from Arthur's Seat" publishers: "Egg Box Publishing" editors: "assorted" date: "2016-05-20" link: "https://www.ed.ac.uk/files/atoms/files/fromarthursseat_2016.pdf" page: 76 publication_type: "book" ISBN: "978-1-911343-10-3" image: "poems/book-of.jpg" category: "poem" __typename: "writing" snippet: "We cut stars from our skin and cooked them to a stew" audio: "" video: ""

Published in celebration of works produced within University of Edinburgh, including another poem "January Diaries" which won the Grierson Verse Prize in 2016.

Marianne MacRae January Diaries Grierson Verse Prize Winner 2016 page 82
